trans-unit.target: TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_SEQ_00<tab>Totonowa believes you are ready to join a guildhest.

TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_SEQ_01<tab>Guildhests are special operations organized by Adventurers' Guilds and overseen by battlewardens. To learn more about what guildhests entail, speak with Battlewarden Lost Rabbit.

TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_SEQ_02<tab>Battlewarden Lost Rabbit explains that guildhests will test your ability to work with others to achieve a common goal. Unless you are content to conduct your adventures forever alone, it may be in your best interests to participate in these operations at least once.
TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_TOTONOWA_000_01<tab>While I heartily encourage you to partake of my guildleves, should you seek a different sort of challenge, you might also consider joining a guildhest.

TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_TOTONOWA_000_02<tab>If you wish to know more, pray speak with Battlewarden Lost Rabbit. I will inform her of your success against the peiste so that there are no doubts as to your abilities.
TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_LOSTRABBIT_000_01<tab>You needn't say a word, adventurer. I could hear Totonowa quite well from here.
TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_LOSTRABBIT_000_02<tab>As this would be your first time joining us, allow me a moment to explain in detail just what exactly a guildhest entails.

TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_LOSTRABBIT_000_03<tab>More than a simple levequest, but not quite as realm-shaking as a Grand Company outing, guildhests will test your ability to work together with a small party of battle companions to overcome not-so-small obstacles.
TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_LOSTRABBIT_000_04<tab>The duty is taxing, but the coin is decent, and you will be helping maintain the safety of Eorzea and the well-being of her citizens.
TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_LOSTRABBIT_000_05<tab>If what I described appeals to you, pray speak to me again to join a guildhest.
TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_SYSTEM_000_06<tab>You have unlocked the Duty Finder! This feature allows you to undertake multiplayer duties without having to form a party on your own.

TEXT_SUBWIL154_00058_SYSTEM_000_07<tab>To bring up the Duty Finder interface, select <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty Finder<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> under <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Duty<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>main menu<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>.
